text: Paulo Souza can refer to: *Paulo Renato Souza (1945–2011), Brazilian economist and politician *Marcos Paulo Souza Ribeiro (born 1974), former Brazilian footballer *Leandro Paulo Roberto Souza (born 1987), Brazilian footballer *João Paulo de Souza Dantas (born 1988), Brazilian footballer *Paulo Vinícius Souza dos Santos (born 1990), Brazilian footballer *Paulo Souza (discus), Brazilian athlete in Brazil at the 2012 Summer Paralympics and Brazil at the 2011 Parapan American Games ==See also== * Paulo Sousa (singer) (born 1992), Portuguese singer-songwriter and YouTuber * Paulo Sousa (footballer, born 1967), Portuguese footballer * Paulo Sousa (born 1970), Portuguese footballer and coach * Paulo Sousa (footballer, born 1975), Portuguese footballer * Paulo Sousa (footballer, born 1980), Portuguese footballer
title: Paulo Souza
